title: 1BD 1BTH + W/D + Dog Park + Location
posting_body: Here we know that to you this is much more than an apartment; this is your home.
You’ll love the convenience Northline provides being minutes to I-5 and HWY 99.
The Interurban Trail is also just steps away.
<URL> An ideal commute is just the beginning of what our community has to offer.
Spacious floorplans with sunken living rooms provide a cozy and comfortable feeling inside our homes.
Washers and dryers are included in every home so you can relax and watch your favorite shows while the laundry is being done.
Pets are such a huge part of our community here at Northline and we like to think of them as members of our extended family.
Bring your dog in to the office for a treat or take them out to the dog park onsite to let them run.
Please use the provided complimentary poo-prints bags and garbage located throughout the community.
After the dog is done playing; you can take him over to our self-service dog spa to clean him up!
We look forward to showing you why our residents love living here at Northline.
Note: Max hold period of 7 days from date of application submission.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 665 Sq.
- Large well-designed living spaces with Sunken Living rooms
- Selected Homes with Spacious Patios on bottom floors and decks on upper levels
I-5 north, take Exit 175 / N.E. 145th St. Exit
N. and continue to Linden Ave.
Turn Right into the Driveway at Northline
Park in front of the Leasing office
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
